actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

official_title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily suspend the duty on certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on: (1) 4 amino acetanilide; (2) 6 amino-2-naphthene sulfonic acid; (3) 8 amino-2 naphthene sulfonic acid; (4) 5 (and 8) amino-2 naphthalene sulfonic acid; (5) 5 amino 2 naphthalene sulfonic acid; (6) 1-naphthylamine; (7) 1,4 dihydroxyanthraquinone; (8) 7 Nitro 1,4 naphth (1,2) oxadiazole 5-sulfonic; (9) 4-chloro-a-a-a-trifluoro-o-toluidine; (10) 7-amino-1,3-naphthalene sulfonic acid mono potassium salt; (11) 2-amino-4-chlorophenol; (12) 2,4-diamino benzene sulfonic acid; (13) 2,5 dichloro-4-(3-methyl-5-oxo-2 pyrazolin-1-yl) benzene sulfonic acid; (14) 7-hydroxy 1,3-naphthalene disulfonic acid-dipotassium salt; (15) o-Anisidine; (16) 1-Amino-2-Bromo-4-Hydroxyanthraquinone; (17) 2-chloro-4-nitroaniline; (18) (1,3,3 trimethyl-indoline-2-ylidene) acetaldehyde; (19) 2,3 dihydro 1,3,3 trimethyl-2-methylene-1H-indole; (20) 2((4 aminophenyl) sulfonyl) ethanol hydrogen sulfate ester; and (21) 1,4-diamino-2,3 dihydroanthraquinone. Suspends, through December 31, 1992, the duty on: (1) 4 amino-1-naphthalene sulfonic acid, sodium salt; and (2) 7-anilino-4-hydroxy-2 naphthalene sulfonic acid.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily suspend the duty on certain chemicals.
